meanings.sent1: The superaccurate measurements ensured the experiment's success.
meanings.sent2: Her superaccurate aim in archery always impressed her coach.
meanings.sent3: The superaccurate clock never failed to wake him up on time.
meanings.sent4: His memory was like a superaccurate compass, always pointing him in the right direction.
meanings.sent5: The superaccurate map guided them through the maze-like forest effortlessly.

meanings.definition: Characterized by a high degree of accuracy or precision.
meanings.sent1: The superaccurate scales in the laboratory were essential for the experiment.
meanings.sent2: The superaccurate telescope allowed astronomers to see distant galaxies clearly.
meanings.sent3: The superaccurate weather forecast predicted sunshine during a snowstorm.
meanings.sent4: Her superaccurate memory was like a steel trap, capturing every detail.
meanings.sent5: The superaccurate clock chimed exactly at midnight, signaling the start of the new year.
